connectionParameters.label: API Key
connectionParameters.name: api_key
connectionParameters.desc: API key or token for the threat intelligence service

desc: IP Threat Intelligence integration allows you to identify IP addresses associated with residential proxies, private VPNs, TOR nodes, anonymous proxies, botnets, and other malicious/risky activity. This helps automate threat blocking, alert enrichment, and incident response workflows.

functions.label: Detect Residential Proxies
functions.name: detect_residential_proxies
functions.desc: Identify IP addresses associated with residential proxy networks

inParameters.label: IP Addresses
inParameters.name: ips
inParameters.desc: Comma-separated list or array of IP addresses

functions.label: Detect Private VPN Networks
functions.name: detect_private_vpn
functions.desc: Identify IP addresses associated with private VPN services

inParameters.label: IP Addresses
inParameters.name: ips
inParameters.desc: Comma-separated list or array of IP addresses

functions.label: Detect Tor Nodes
functions.name: detect_tor_nodes
functions.desc: Identify IP addresses that are Tor exit nodes

inParameters.label: IP Addresses
inParameters.name: ips
inParameters.desc: Comma-separated list or array of IP addresses

functions.desc: Identify IP addresses associated with anonymous proxy services

inParameters.label: IP Addresses
inParameters.name: ips
inParameters.desc: Comma-separated list or array of IP addresses

functions.name: detect_botnets

functions.label: Detect Malicious or Risky IPs
functions.name: detect_malicious_ips
functions.desc: Identify IP addresses or IP ranges associated with malicious or high-risk activity

inParameters.label: IP Addresses
inParameters.name: ips
inParameters.desc: Comma-separated list or array of IP addresses or CIDR ranges
